backend/main.mo: Defines core ERP types for organizations, CRM, HRMS, ecommerce, and includes authorization and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Implements wallet-related legacy-to-new state migration by returning the same maps unchanged.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme configuration defining light and dark mode variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint hosting the root div and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, providers, authentication, profile setup, Stripe setup, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting product categories using dialogs and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin table showing orders with status badges and a selector to update order status via API.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: UI for listing organizations and creating new ones with form handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Provides product CRUD management with dialogs, form handling, and category integration.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: Manages contact CRUD operations with identity-based ownership and modal form UI.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Handles lead creation, editing, and deletion with stage management and linked contacts.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Implements opportunity CRUD workflows with value, stage, probability, and notes handling.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays a sales pipeline overview using pipeline and lead data, including stage counts, progress bars, and summary metrics.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding, GitHub link, and styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with auth controls, organization switcher, navigation links, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Placeholder component showing a card for attendance tracking with coming-soon messaging.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: Provides full CRUD UI for departments using dialogs, tables, and react-query mutations.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Manages employee records with add, edit, delete dialogs and department/status selection, using react-query mutations.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Lists pending leave requests with approve/reject actions and loading states.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder payroll management card indicating future payroll processing features.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder component for employee performance tracking with coming-soon messaging.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown component allowing users to switch between organizations with active selection display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects a user's name and submits it via saveProfile, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal that configures Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries when Stripe is not yet set up.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Interface for listing, adding, and deleting wallets, including form inputs, status handling, and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays user's wallet balances and recent transactions with auto-refresh and status/type formatting.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a cart context with item storage, quantity management, totals, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Maintains active organization state, loads organizations via react-query, syncs with localStorage, and handles identity changes.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Provides context and state management for selecting, connecting, and tracking wallet connector availability and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, state, and login flow using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, organizations, CRM, and ERP-related data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from the context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard UI showing analytics, access control, and management components for products, categories, orders, and wallets.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with item management and Stripe or ICP wallet checkout flow.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: Admin-only CRM dashboard showing stats and navigation to contact, lead, opportunity, and pipeline management.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Admin-only HRMS dashboard with employee, department, attendance, leave, payroll, performance, and wallet management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders with status, details, and cancellation options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with navigation options back to cart or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart and shows a success message with links to orders or shopping.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Product catalog with search, category filtering, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines placeholder ERP domain types for products, CRM, HR, payroll, analytics, and related IDs mirroring backend structures.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Utility to shorten identity strings by truncating the middle for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements the Oisy wallet connector with availability checks, connect/disconnect, and connection state retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Implements the Plug wallet connector including connect flow, account retrieval, and connection state checks.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Type declarations for in-page Plug and Oisy wallet providers added to the global window object.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors and exposes lookup utilities by provider ID.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines shared wallet connector interfaces, provider IDs, and identity info types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project version, implemented features, and current multi-organization progress.
